Node.definition: Filament Renderable scene node with 3D transformation
Node.note: This is a scene graph node, NOT a 2D drawing point

Engine.definition: Filament Engine singleton, lives in ViewModel scope
Engine.warning: NEVER destroy in surfaceDestroyed - use destroySwapChain only

SwapChain.definition: Rendering surface for Filament, tied to Android Surface lifecycle
SwapChain.lifecycle: Created in surfaceCreated, destroyed in surfaceDestroyed

Anchor.definition: ARCore tracking anchor in physical space
Anchor.note: Represents a pose in real world that ARCore tracks
